title: Sci-Fi Swords Sound Pack
description: A collection of futuristic slashing weapon sound effects, containing 186 sounds for activation, light and space swords, hits, whooshes, scrapes.
longDescription:
Audio Preview: https://soundcloud.com/magic-sound-effects/sets/sci-fi-swords-sound-pack

Sound List: https://www.dropbox.com/s/opof1u9xk00gamj/MSE%20-%20Sci-Fi%20Swords%20Sound%20Pack_v1.0.pdf?dl=0


The package includes 186 sound effects divided into 5 folders - "Hits", "Launch", "LightSword", "SpaceSword", "Whooshes":


  1. In the "Hits" folder youâ€™ll find the sounds of sword hits with a metallic resonance - 24 sound effects inside.
  2. "Launch" is four versions of the futuristic sword activation sounds - 40 sound effects inside.
  3. The "LightSword" folder contains the sounds of the light sword hits and scrapes - 20 sound effects inside.
  4. The "SpaceSword" folder contains the sounds of the electric space sword hits - 10 sound effects inside.
  5. The "Whooshes" folder includes 8 different versions of whooshes in a futuristic style for sounding the movement and hits of sci-fi swords and other futuristic weapons - 92 sound effects inside.


This asset and the whoosh sounds would also work well to create shots of lasers, guns, cannons, blasters and other futuristic shooting weapons.


For support and other questions, please send an email to: magic.sound.effects@gmail.com.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 186 sound effects
  • 44.1 khz, 16 bit, wav, stereo
  • 92 sci-fi whooshes
  • 44 hit sounds
  • 40 launch sounds
  • 10 scrapes
  • great for game scenes, animations and trailers for shooters, strategies and more


Number of Audio Waves: 186

Number of Audio Cues: 186

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 07 minutes 05 seconds

Supported Development Platforms:

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
